title: The Travelling divorcees
creator_credit: Michelle Rayner, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Michelle Rayner reflects on the evolution of the marriage between Patricia and Michael, her parents. Throughout the years they have gone through many changes both personally and as a couple, and often reflecting the times.
creator_credit_for_label: Michelle Rayner, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
